description: This Dart file defines a TransactionProvider class used in a Flutter application to fetch and manage transaction data from an API. It extends ChangeNotifier for state management and interacts with an ApiClient to retrieve data.

classes.name: TransactionProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier that manages fetching and storing transaction data for Flutter UI components.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches transactions asynchronously from the API, updates the internal list, loading state, and error state, and notifies listeners.
